entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 12:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
